Constructor Detail

ContextVector

public ContextVector()

ContextVector

public ContextVector(java.lang.String[] elements)
Contructs a new context vector from the given array of elements. Sets the element frequency as value for the features of this vector.

Parameters:
elements -

ContextVector

public ContextVector(java.util.List<java.lang.String> elements)
Contructs a new context vector from the given array of elements. Sets the element frequency as value for the features of this vector.

Parameters:
elements -

ContextVector

public ContextVector(java.lang.String[] elements,
                     float weight)
Contructs a new context vector from the given array of elements. Sets the element frequency as value for the features of this vector. Also sets the weight of this context vector (default: 1.0) for later scoring.

Parameters:
elements -
weight -

ContextVector

public ContextVector(java.util.List<java.lang.String> elements,
                     java.lang.String specific_type)
Contructs a new context vector from the given list of elements. Sets the element frequency as value for the features of this vector.
Sets the type of this context vector according to specific_type.
If the elements are of a TERM or TEXT type, they get transformed into lowercase.

Parameters:
elements - -
specific_type - - type of the context vector (plain text, GO codes, ...)

ContextVector

public ContextVector(java.lang.String[] elements,
                     java.lang.String specific_type)
Contructs a new context vector from the given array of elements. Sets the element frequency as value for the features of this vector.
Sets the type of this context vector according to specific_type.
If the elements are of a TERM or TEXT type, they get transformed into lowercase.

Parameters:
elements - -
specific_type - - type of the context vector (plain text, GO codes, ...)

ContextVector

public ContextVector(java.lang.String[] elements,
                     java.lang.String specific_type,
                     float weight)
Contructs a new context vector from the given array of elements. Sets the element frequency as value for the features of this vector.
Sets the type of this context vector according to specific_type.
If the elements are of a TERM or TEXT type, they get transformed into lowercase.
Also sets the weight of this context vector (default: 1.0) for later scoring.

Parameters:
elements - -
specific_type - - type of the context vector (plain text, GO codes, ...)
weight -

ContextVector

public ContextVector(Feature[] elements)
Contructs a new context vector from the given array of features. Sets the value for each feature according to the original features. Duplicate features in the array will be mapped to one feature, with combined (sum) values.

Parameters:
elements - -

ContextVector

public ContextVector(Feature[] elements,
                     float weight)
Contructs a new context vector from the given array of features. Sets the value for each feature according to the original features. Duplicate features in the array will be mapped to one feature, with combined (sum) values. Also sets the weight of this context vector (default: 1.0) for later scoring.

Parameters:
elements - -
weight -

ContextVector

public ContextVector(Feature[] elements,
                     java.lang.String specific_type)
Contructs a new context vector from the given array of features. Sets the value for each feature according to the original features. Duplicate features in the array will be mapped to one feature, with combined (sum) values.
Sets the type of this context vector according to type.
If the elements are of a TERM or TEXT type, they get transformed into lowercase.

Parameters:
elements - -
specific_type - - type of the context vector (plain text, GO codes, ...)

ContextVector

public ContextVector(Feature[] elements,
                     java.lang.String specific_type,
                     float weight)
Contructs a new context vector from the given array of features. Sets the value for each feature according to the original features. Duplicate features in the array will be mapped to one feature, with combined (sum) values.
Sets the type of this context vector according to type.
If the elements are of a TERM or TEXT type, they get transformed into lowercase.
Also sets the weight of this context vector (default: 1.0) for later scoring.

Parameters:
elements -
specific_type - - type of the context vector (plain text, GO codes, ...)
weight -
Method Detail

addElement

public void addElement(Feature elem)
Adds a feature to this context vector. If it is already present, changes only the value of the existing feature accordingly (sum of both values).

Parameters:
elem - - the new feature

containsSubsequent

public boolean containsSubsequent(java.lang.String[] elements)
Checks if this context vector contains the given elements in the same order. Uses toString() and joins all elements with an optional white space or hyphen.

Parameters:
elements -
Returns:

euclideanNorm

public float euclideanNorm()
Computes the Euclidean Norm of this vector: sqrt(x*x), where * is the inner product.
